title: Political Support Leading To Increasing Fallout For Crypto
description: Support for cryptocurrencies from US President Donald Trump or Argentine leader Javier Milei has seen investors lose billions of dollars and is damaging a sector struggling for credibility, researchers told AFP."The entire crypto industry is being tarnished," said Claire Balva, strategy director for fintech company Deblock.
